entry.title: Friday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers becoming mixed with flurries this afternoon and ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
